LABEL: 0x25
STRING: In the end...

LABEL: 0x39
STRING: I couldn't find her.

LABEL: 0xEA
STRING: I walked around the ship, checking one room at a time.

LABEL: 0x11C
STRING: But, there was no sign of her.

LABEL: 0x146
STRING: Instead...

LABEL: 0x15E
STRING: I found that man's body lying there.

LABEL: 0x194
STRING: There was nothing hidden.

LABEL: 0x1BA
STRING: He was lying on the corridor in the rear section, probably in the same state as he had been when he died.

LABEL: 0x216
STRING: He was lying face-down and bleeding from his head.

LABEL: 0x250
STRING: ...There was something shiny around his neck.

LABEL: 0x280
STRING: I went up to him, grabbed his shoulder, and rolled him over to his back.

LABEL: 0x2B8
STRING: My hand got wet when I touched his blood.

LABEL: 0x2DE
STRING: ...The possibility of an infection crossed my mind for a moment, but it didn't matter anymore.

LABEL: 0x326
STRING: He had something familiar hanging around his neck.

LABEL: 0x360
STRING: I see...

LABEL: 0x37A
STRING: Hiragino had prayed for him.

LABEL: 0x3BE
STRING: Upon closer inspection, the blood flowing from his right shoulder was clotted.

LABEL: 0x400
STRING: A speargun wound...?

LABEL: 0x42A
STRING: But, it had clearly missed his heart.

LABEL: 0x46A
STRING: Even an amateur could tell this wasn't a fatal wound.

LABEL: 0x4A6
STRING: So, did he die because of the wound on the back of his head?

LABEL: 0x4D2
STRING: But... why was he injured twice?

LABEL: 0x510
STRING: I stared at his silent face.

LABEL: 0x53A
STRING: For some reason...

LABEL: 0x552
STRING: His face felt familiar.

LABEL: 0x662
STRING: In the end, I couldn't find her after that.

LABEL: 0x69A
STRING: I didn't encounter the light of <COOS> either.

LABEL: 0x6D2
STRING: The threat was gone.

LABEL: 0x6EE
STRING: Touri was alive somewhere.

LABEL: 0x718
STRING: Once I thought of that, there was nothing left to worry about.

LABEL: 0x760
STRING: I just had to patiently wait for rescue.

LABEL: 0x784
STRING: The rescue that was sure to come...

LABEL: 0x7AA
STRING: Our time limit was nearing.

LABEL: 0x7D0
STRING: The heating should have been turned off long ago, but come to think of it, I didn't feel the least bit cold.

LABEL: 0x828
STRING: My body might be nearing its limit as well.

LABEL: 0x858
STRING: ――Yukari.

LABEL: 0x86E
STRING: She continued to sleep, infected with <COOS> and <Alice>.

LABEL: 0x8AC
STRING: Her body was slowly being eaten away.

LABEL: 0x937
STRING: I went back to the emergency room and took a look at her face.

LABEL: 0xA3D
STRING: She was sleeping silently while breathing faintly.

LABEL: 0xA6B
STRING: She was still alive.

LABEL: 0xA8B
STRING: Her sleeping face was peaceful, despite being infected by a virus and bacteria.

LABEL: 0xAD7
STRING: That felt like a joke in and of itself.

LABEL: 0xAFF
STRING: There was nothing I could do for her.

LABEL: 0xB29
STRING: There was nothing, but――

LABEL: 0xB45
STRING: At the very least...

LABEL: 0xB61
STRING: I had to send her back to the surface.

LABEL: 0xB8F
STRING: I sat down beside the sleeping Yukari.

LABEL: 0xBB7
STRING: I touched her wrist gently.

LABEL: 0xBDD
STRING: I could feel her warm heartbeat.

LABEL: 0xBFF
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0xC1B
STRING: 「There was so much I wanted to ask you...」

LABEL: 0xC55
STRING: 「Tell me... About Nee-san...」

LABEL: 0xC87
STRING: I was going to ask her once things had calmed down.

LABEL: 0xCB7
STRING: About the details of her death that were hidden from me.

LABEL: 0xCEB
STRING: About what she was doing at ROMLES when she was still alive.

LABEL: 0xD2B
STRING: I wanted to hear about her from Yukari, who should have known her.

LABEL: 0xD61
STRING: I had to ask her... And yet...

LABEL: 0xDFF
STRING: She wouldn't wake up.

LABEL: 0xE23
STRING: Even though the clues to what I wanted to know were lying right in front of me...

LABEL: 0xE69
STRING: ...I couldn't reach for them.

LABEL: 0xE8D
STRING: It was almost like――

LABEL: 0xEAB
STRING: ――This was a punishment for refusing to know,

LABEL: 0xEE3
STRING: to choose, to reach out.

LABEL: 0xF13
STRING: 「Yukari-san...」

LABEL: 0xF2F
STRING: She couldn't hear me.

LABEL: 0xF51
STRING: I knew that.

LABEL: 0xF6D
STRING: Just a little more patience.

LABEL: 0xF8D
STRING: Just a little more, and rescue would arrive.

LABEL: 0x1059
STRING: ...Just as I was about to let go of her wrist...

LABEL: 0x1089
STRING: I noticed something strange again.

LABEL: 0x10B9
STRING: I flipped up her sleeve.

LABEL: 0x10DD
STRING: ――There was no light.

LABEL: 0x10F9
STRING: There was no sign of the ominous light of <COOS> on her arms.

LABEL: 0x1143
STRING: What was going on here?

LABEL: 0x1169
STRING: Had Hiragino lied...?

LABEL: 0x118D
STRING: There was no reason for him to do that.

LABEL: 0x11AB
STRING: Was she cured, then?

LABEL: 0x11C9
STRING: What triggered it?

LABEL: 0x11E9
STRING: Things that I couldn't understand disrupted my thinking.

LABEL: 0x1287
STRING: The truth.

LABEL: 0x129D
STRING: Where was the truth?

LABEL: 0x12C7
STRING: I found myself reaching for the <Onyx>.

LABEL: 0x1309
STRING: I took the recording device out of my pocket.

LABEL: 0x1331
STRING: The smart glasses that Reiri had brought in.

LABEL: 0x135F
STRING: I put them on again and tried to access the ship's records.

LABEL: 0x13A9
STRING: The sound of them pairing rang out.

LABEL: 0x13CD
STRING: Once again, the records of the ship permeated my vision and hearing, as well as my entire body's senses.

LABEL: 0x14E4
STRING: A vortex of color, a vortex of images, a vortex of sound.

LABEL: 0x150E
STRING: My second journey was easier than the first.

LABEL: 0x1544
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x1673
STRING: The first thing that caught my eye was a scene from the day before yesterday.

LABEL: 0x16B1
STRING: A nostalgic and cheerful conversation.

LABEL: 0x16D5
STRING: Saihouji Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x16F1
STRING: Hiragino Sousuke.

LABEL: 0x1709
STRING: They were alive.

LABEL: 0x1723
STRING: Everyone still had hope at the time.

LABEL: 0x1751
STRING: We thought that we would definitely escape, and would give it our all――

LABEL: 0x178D
STRING: How had things ended up like this?

LABEL: 0x17C7
STRING: Where had we gone wrong?

LABEL: 0x18D6
STRING: The days up until now replayed in fast forward.

LABEL: 0x1906
STRING: The video eventually moved to the explosion in the steam room.

LABEL: 0x19A7
STRING: Hiragino carried me out after I collapsed.

LABEL: 0x19D1
STRING: Together with Yukari, he rushed to the treatment room.

LABEL: 0x1A01
STRING: I hadn't seen this scene before. There was no way I could have.

LABEL: 0x1A39
STRING: Right.

LABEL: 0x1A4F
STRING: During this time, I was unconscious.

LABEL: 0x1A77
STRING: It was a blank space that I had no knowledge of...

LABEL: 0x1B6C
STRING: The viewpoint of the video then shifted to the rear section at the same time.

LABEL: 0x1BA8
STRING: There was a light in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x1BCE
STRING: Lying in the rear section, with the lights dimmed, was...

LABEL: 0x1C00
STRING: ...That man from ROMLES who was infected with <COOS>.

LABEL: 0x1CEC
STRING: With some groaning, he stood up and...

LABEL: 0x1D26
STRING: ...Staggered forward along the wall.

LABEL: 0x1D52
STRING: ――So, he was still alive after being infected by <COOS>, as I thought.

LABEL: 0x1D90
STRING: No... He seemed to be acting strange.

LABEL: 0x1DBE
STRING: He was protecting his shoulder area. It was dark and hard to tell, but it looked as if blood was flowing from there.

LABEL: 0x1E1A
STRING: The man kept walking, either looking for help or for no reason at all.

LABEL: 0x1E5E
STRING: He had survived, but...

LABEL: 0x1E90
STRING: I knew how his story would end.

LABEL: 0x1F33
STRING: Without a pause, a figure appeared before him.

LABEL: 0x1F6F
STRING: A shadow stood in the dark hallway.

LABEL: 0x1F97
STRING: It was――

LABEL: 0x1FAF
STRING: It was not Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x2094
STRING: 「Reiri...?」

LABEL: 0x20B0
STRING: It was Reiri.

LABEL: 0x2148
STRING: The grinning girl slammed her slender fist into the man's solar plexus.

LABEL: 0x21F7
STRING: He fell to the floor.

LABEL: 0x2231
STRING: Reiri dragged him away with no concern for his luminescent speckles.

LABEL: 0x227D
STRING: ...Just as she had dragged Hikari's body in the video.

LABEL: 0x22DD
STRING: 「Reiri killed him...?」

LABEL: 0x2303
STRING: Before I knew it, I was drawn into the images.

LABEL: 0x233B
STRING: I didn't know if he was dead or not.

LABEL: 0x2365
STRING: But, Reiri was dragging the unconscious man with her.

LABEL: 0x239B
STRING: The image of her in my memory dragging Hikari overlapped with her in front of me.

LABEL: 0x23E1
STRING: Why the hell would she――

LABEL: 0x23FF
STRING: Right then...

LABEL: 0x2489
STRING: ――Touri appeared.

LABEL: 0x24A9
STRING: The same scene was reproduced.

LABEL: 0x24CF
STRING: She held an oxygen tank in her right hand.

LABEL: 0x2503
STRING: Reiri let go of the man's collar.

LABEL: 0x2531
STRING: Then, shortly after...

LABEL: 0x254F
STRING: Touri raised the oxygen tank

LABEL: 0x26C4
STRING: and swung it down on the head of the man lying face-down on the floor.

LABEL: 0x271C
STRING: Something flowed from the man's head.

LABEL: 0x2768
STRING: Touri let go of the tank,

LABEL: 0x278E
STRING: ran over to Reiri, and――

LABEL: 0x27B8
STRING: Reiri fell to the floor.

LABEL: 0x27D8
STRING: Did she strangle her again...?

LABEL: 0x2800
STRING: Touri dragged Reiri's body away, and before long――

LABEL: 0x28A6
STRING: She tossed her inside the warehouse.

LABEL: 0x28E6
STRING: It all happened in an instant in the video.

LABEL: 0x290A
STRING: The information was too dense, however.

LABEL: 0x293A
STRING: Various memories were connected to each other, but no order was formed.

LABEL: 0x2A1C
STRING: Why did Reiri go through the trouble of dragging the man infected with <COOS> all that way?

LABEL: 0x2A64
STRING: Why did Touri kill him?

LABEL: 0x2A8A
STRING: Even if I thought about it, I wasn't sure.

LABEL: 0x2AAE
STRING: However, there was one thing that became clear to me in all of this.

LABEL: 0x2AEC
STRING: Hiragino, who said he had killed that man "with his own hands," couldn't kill Yukari.

LABEL: 0x2B46
STRING: It wasn't a contradiction.

LABEL: 0x2B6E
STRING: In the end...

LABEL: 0x2B82
STRING: In the end, he hadn't killed anyone.

LABEL: 0x2BB2
STRING: Judging from his injuries, the man had been attacked twice.

LABEL: 0x2BEA
STRING: First, he was shot in the shoulder with a speargun.

LABEL: 0x2C1C
STRING: And then, Touri had swung down an oxygen tank on his head.

LABEL: 0x2C60
STRING: The latter injury turned out to be fatal.

LABEL: 0x2CF8
STRING: ...So, was the speargun wound caused by Hiragino?

LABEL: 0x2D46
STRING: After the accident, he probably focused on treating me.

LABEL: 0x2D90
STRING: And the fact that Touri was carrying that oxygen tank in the video meant that...

LABEL: 0x2DDA
STRING: ...At that point, my operation was not over yet.

LABEL: 0x2E18
STRING: That meant that Hiragino didn't have time to leave the emergency room.

LABEL: 0x2E6C
STRING: There was no room for him to intervene so far.

LABEL: 0x2EA0
STRING: There was no time for him to run into the man in the rear section.

LABEL: 0x2EDA
STRING: In that case, who could have fired the speargun before Touri put an end to his life with the tank...?

LABEL: 0x2F36
STRING: I could only think of one person who had the opportunity to do so.

LABEL: 0x2F78
STRING: There was someone who had gone to the rear section before the explosion occurred in the steam room.

LABEL: 0x3079
STRING: ...It could only have been Yukari.

LABEL: 0x309F
STRING: There was no way she wouldn't notice him while she was there to kill Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3176
STRING: It made sense.

LABEL: 0x3190
STRING: Had Hiragino realized all this when he saw the man's corpse?

LABEL: 0x31D4
STRING: I was sure he had.

LABEL: 0x31FA
STRING: All the while placing his cross on the neck of the man Yukari had failed to kill and whom Touri had finished off.

LABEL: 0x3246
STRING: What had he thought at that moment?

LABEL: 0x326E
STRING: It was too heavy to be called a prayer.

LABEL: 0x3296
STRING: The man's death made him harbor certain thoughts.

LABEL: 0x32CA
STRING: It must have shaken his faith.

LABEL: 0x33A0
STRING: 「If that's the case...」

LABEL: 0x33C6
STRING: That confession of his...

LABEL: 0x33E6
STRING: His anguish over killing a man...

LABEL: 0x3412
STRING: It was all a lie.

LABEL: 0x3428
STRING: Half of it, at least.

LABEL: 0x344A
STRING: I was sure the anguish he expressed was real.

LABEL: 0x348C
STRING: He must have been asking himself whether what he was about to do was right or wrong,

LABEL: 0x34B8
STRING: while concealing the truth from me.

LABEL: 0x350C
STRING: ――Whether he should kill Yukari or not.

LABEL: 0x3542
STRING: At the same time...

LABEL: 0x355C
STRING: Was he trying to shoulder the sins of those who survived? Was I overthinking it?

LABEL: 0x35AA
STRING: ...But, no matter how much he deceived us...

LABEL: 0x35DC
STRING: Touri's wrongdoings wouldn't go away.

LABEL: 0x3600
STRING: Just like how my sins wouldn't disappear.

LABEL: 0x3630
STRING: 「I'll get her back alive.」

LABEL: 0x38D4
STRING: ...How long had I been asleep?

LABEL: 0x3904
STRING: I felt the passage of time through the dry sensation inside my mouth.

LABEL: 0x3938
STRING: I awoke abruptly.

LABEL: 0x3954
STRING: Although I knew it was impossible, I felt as if someone had called me.

LABEL: 0x39A0
STRING: It was impossible, but that voice sounded like――

LABEL: 0x3A92
STRING: 【It's morning.】

LABEL: 0x3AAC
STRING: In the end, it was POL's voice.

LABEL: 0x3ADB
STRING: The state-of-the-art AI installed on the <SHEEP III>.

LABEL: 0x3B14
STRING: Come to think of it, had POL also been watching over this tragedy the whole time?

LABEL: 0x3B57
STRING: But――

LABEL: 0x3B6F
STRING: When I heard POL's voice,

LABEL: 0x3B96
STRING: it reminded me of my sister...

LABEL: 0x3BCC
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x3BE6
STRING: Yukari, who should have been asleep, slowly opened her mouth.

LABEL: 0x3C33
STRING: 「...Tell me...」

LABEL: 0x3CBB
STRING: 「Did Hitoha

LABEL: 0x3CCE
STRING: make it back to the surface?」
